channel.title: CVE Feed for enartia -- Piraeus Bank WooCommerce Payment Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for enartia -- Piraeus Bank WooCommerce Payment Gateway

item.title: CVE-2024-0610|2024-08-01T18:11:35.654Z -- enartia -- piraeus%20bank%20woocommerce%20payment%20gateway
item.description: The Piraeus Bank WooCommerce Payment Gateway plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to time-based blind SQL Injection via the 'MerchantReference' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.6.5.1 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.
